name: Sturgis' Gambit
description:
This was a game made for our final Capstone Project at Kennesaw State University. In this Chess variation, each team is divided up into 3 military corps. Each corp gets 1 move per turn! Capturing pieces are also not immediate as each piece has a different probability associated with it!

Developers: 
James Grady @Jaymealann
Damen DeBerry @basicDamen
Tyra Duadoo @misstj555
Ashlei Williams 
Mahad Farah
Mandela Issa-Boube
